Method Detail

getProperties

public java.util.List<EditorConfig.OutPair> getProperties(java.lang.String filename)
                                                   throws EditorConfigException,
                                                          javax.script.ScriptException
Parse editorconfig files corresponding to the file path given by filename, and return the parsing result.

Parameters:
filename - The full path to be parsed. The path is usually the path of the file which is currently edited by the editor.
Returns:
The parsing result stored in a list of EditorConfig.OutPair.
Throws:
ParsingException - If an .editorconfig file could not be parsed
PathException - If an invalid file path is specified as filename
EditorConfigException - If an EditorConfig exception occurs. Usually one of ParsingException or PathException.
javax.script.ScriptException - If a Jython exception happens.
